alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 430 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Royal Palm Hammock to 9 miles west of Everglades City to near Plantation Island. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Cape Romano, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, East Naples, Lely Resort, Royal Palm Hammock, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, South Blocks Golde, Port Of The Island, Goodland, Fiddlers Creek, Key Marco and Cape Romano Aquatic Preserve. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until these storms pass. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
